subject: Hi,
body:
Hi,
I'm Rita,
I'm 36 years old and I'm from UK
My late husband is from Trinidad and Tobago
I have a New Year offer for you,
Please get back for more details.....

subject: Re:   Hi,
body:
Hello Rita,

It's nice to meet you! I'm sorry to hear about your late husband. Trinidad and Tobago sounds like a beautiful place, he must have had some wonderful stories from there.

You mentioned a New Year offer? That sounds interesting, could you tell me more about it?

Best wishes,
Terry
